# reverse_string (Resource)

Example resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "reverse_string" "example" {
  input = "some-value"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `input` (String) Input string to be reversed

### Read-Only

- `result` (String) Reversed string
